works.name: Natours
works.title: Natours - fully responsive, modern and cross-browser HTML site
works.alt: Natours, deebov, HTML, CSS, Flexbox, modern, responsive, cross-browser
works.description: A fully responsive and cross-browser static web site, built with pure HTML and CSS (without using JavaScript) that allows many browsers to work with it well. In the site was built very modern and beautiful design features.

works.name: Trillo
works.title: Trillo - fully responsive, modern and static web site
works.alt: Trillo, deebov, HTML, CSS, Flexbox, modern, responsive, cross-browser
works.description: A fully responsive and modern static web site, built with pure HTML and CSS (without using JavaScript) that allows many browsers to work with it well. This site was built with using CSS Flexbox Layouts.In the site was built very modern and beautiful design features.

works.name: Kinopoisk - telegram messenger bot
works.title: Kinopoisk - telegram messenger bot for looking movies and cinemas
works.alt: Kinipoisk, telegram-bot, telegram, node.js, mongodb, mongoose deebov, HTML, CSS, Flexbox, modern, responsive, cross-browser
works.description: This telegram messenger bot was written on Node.js and used MongoDB for database. This bot can find for you movies and cinemas that you like and save it in its bookmark.
